page.title: 18CUSTOMS IN ABERNYTE
page.content: Halloween is the 31st October.At the school they draw pictures of ghosts, witches and scary things.In Abernyte there is a party in the school when everyone ducks for apples and has fun. When it gets dark the children dress up and go guising.Guising means they go visiting round the houses wearing fancy dress,singing songs, telling jokes and playing tunes.The children are given sweets,nuts and money.If you don't give the children something then the witches are supposed to get the people. When it is snowy everybody goes with their sledges to Abernyte Hill.People use plastic bags, sledges and half of a plastic barrel,Others go to the Witches Dub above Abernyte to skate. At midnight on Hogmany the church bell rings, no_one knows who rings it.
